scripts.concat-js: cat src/js/grid.js src/js/gol.js src/js/index.js src/js/smoothScroll.js > bundle/fuckWebpack.js
scripts.concat-css: cat src/css/base.css src/css/gol.css src/css/header.css src/css/navbar.css src/css/cool.css > bundle/webpackSucks.css
scripts.minify: minify bundle/fuckWebpack.js > dist/fuckWebpack.min.js && minify bundle/webpackSucks.css > dist/webpackSucks.min.css
scripts.build: mkdir bundle dist 2> /dev/null & npm run concat-js && npm run concat-css && npm run minify
